articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Are CryptoPunks modern art? Yuga Labs believes so, and aims to solidify their historical legacy by placing the Ethereum PFPs within art museums.
articles.title: CryptoPunks Come to Art Museums as Yuga Labs Begins Donating Ethereum NFTs

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Today, Uniswap became the second-largest exchange after Binance for Ethereum trading in the last 24 hours.
articles.title: Uniswap Overtakes Coinbase as Second-Largest Exchange Trading Ethereum Today

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: FTX-owned cryptocurrency exchange Liquid Global has announced the suspension of all fiat and crypto withdrawals.
articles.title: Liquid Global Halts Withdrawals as FTX Contagion Continues

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The NBA team is the latest sports franchise to cut ties with the now-bankrupt FTX, which splurged big money on sports sponsorships.
articles.title: Golden State Warriors Joins List of Sports Franchises Cutting FTX Ties

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: The hacker involved in draining the bankrupt crypto exchange FTX made several cross-chain transactions to cash out.
articles.title: FTX Attacker Still Owns Altcoins Worth $338 Million

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Crypto-centric venture firm Sino Global Capital has confirmed its exposure to FTX amounting to “mid-seven figures.”
articles.title: Crypto Venture Firm Sino Global Reveals 'Mid-Seven Figures' Exposure to Bankrupt FTX

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: New filings also confirm FTX Exchange’s new leadership is in touch with regulators and dealing with Friday’s hack.
articles.title: Over 1 Million Creditors Could Have Claims in FTX Bankruptcy

articles.description: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of API to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: A bizarre series of tweets by the embattled former FTX CEO has Crypto Twitter scratching its collective head.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Says He's 'Improvising' His Cryptic One-Letter Tweets

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Beeple will serve as an advisor for Yuga after the NFT startup he co-founded joins the Bored Ape crew.
articles.title: Bored Ape Creator Yuga Labs Acquires Beeple’s WENEW, 10KTF NFT Project

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The links between Solana, FTX, and Alameda are made clear as SOL continues to fall in price, now down 57% over the past week.
articles.title: Solana Foundation Details FTX, SBF Financial Ties as SOL Struggles

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: Crypto compliance firm Argus reports that Alameda, which was supposed to be distinct from Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX, amassed tokens before their listings on the exchange were made public.
articles.title: Alameda Research Was Frontrunning FTX Token Listings: Report

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The now-defunct and bankrupt trading desk moved $2.7 million worth of Serum, FTX, and Uniswap tokens into the wallet yesterday, on-chain data shows.
articles.title: SBF's Alameda Moved $89 Million Worth of Crypto Into a New Wallet

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: How will the collapse of FTX affect the course of crypto policy in Washington? The landscape is already shifting.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Made Himself the Face of Crypto in DC—Now What?

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Whether the wallet belongs to the Ethereum cofounder is in dispute, but it has transacted with his other known addresses.
articles.title: Wallet Linked to Vitalik Buterin Sells Off $3.75 Million in Ethereum

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Crypto investment funds are seeing their assets trapped in the unfolding collapse of FTX.
articles.title: Crypto Hedge Fund Ikigai Loses Access to 'Large Majority' of Assets on FTX: Founder

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The crypto lending platform is asking customers not to deposit any funds as it reels from "significant" exposure to FTX.
articles.title: BlockFi Tells Customers Withdrawals Still Paused Due to ‘Significant Exposure to FTX’

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The company says the action, which targeted funds drained from FTX late Friday, came at the direction of U.S. law enforcement officials.
articles.title: Paxos Freezes $19 Million in PAXG Tokens Linked to FTX

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: After CryptoKicks comes .Swoosh, a destination for virtual apparel and other NFT-based products, with the first drop due in January.
articles.title: Nike Launches .Swoosh Web3 Platform, With Polygon NFTs Due in 2023

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: Adidas’ own Indigo Herz Bored Ape NFT joins Messi and Benzema in a teaser trailer for Qatar's upcoming FIFA World Cup.
articles.title: Adidas' Bored Ape NFT Makes Appearance With Messi, Benzema in New World Cup Trailer

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek sought to soothe investor woes after an errant $400 million transfer shook users over the weekend.
articles.title: Crypto.com CEO Says 'Business as Usual' After Revelations of 'Accidental' $400M Transfer

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The CEO of Binance revealed plans to implement a new Proof-of-Reserves protocol developed by Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin.
articles.title: Binance to Be 'Guinea Pig' for Vitalik Buterin's Proof-of-Reserves Protocol: CZ

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Payments giant Visa is reportedly shuttering its partnership with FTX following the latter’s bankruptcy filing last week.
articles.title: Visa Pulls Plug on FTX Partnership, Will Wind Down Debit Cards: Report

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: When Binance announced it would bail out FTX, daily trading volumes mushroomed on decentralized exchanges like Uniswap.
articles.title: DeFi Weekly Exchange Volume Hits $32 Billion Amid FTX Collapse

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Alongside shuttering FTT trading pairs with Bitcoin and Ethereum, Binance is also closing off the ability to short FTX’s token.
articles.title: Binance to Remove Trading Pairs for FTX Token—Except With Stablecoin BUSD

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: The California-based accountant turned politician Brad Sherman has intensified his crypto criticism amid the recent market turmoil.
articles.title: Congressman Brad Sherman Takes Aim at ‘Billionaire Crypto Bros’ for Slowing Regulation

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Amid FTX Exchange’s collapse, the token powering self-custody crypto wallet Trust Wallet has soared as users flee exchanges.
articles.title: Trust Wallet Token Soars 47% as Binance CEO Shills Self-Custody Solution

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The world's largest crypto exchange Binance is forming an "industry recovery fund" to help projects overcome possible liquidity crises.
articles.title: Binance CEO Announces 'Industry Recovery Fund' Amid FTX Exchange Collapse

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Custodial wallets are considered a low-entry barrier for those new to the crypto space since they are easy to use and can be accessed from any device with an internet connection. However, security is a major concern.
articles.title: Non-Custodial vs Custodial Wallets: What's the Difference?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The collapse of Sam Bankman-Fried’s empire was the talk of the town at this year’s LaBitConf in Buenos Aires.
articles.title: FTX Crisis Is the Hottest Topic at the Biggest Bitcoin Conference in Latin America

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Lawmakers sounded off on the need for better investor protections after a chaotic week.
articles.title: Chorus of Lawmakers Collectively Call for Crypto Controls in FTX Fallout

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The entire market crashed this week as one of the industry’s biggest players watched their empire totally evaporate in five days flat.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: FTX’s Collapse as It Happened, in Tweets

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The Royal Bahamas Police Force is "working closely with the Bahamas Securities Commission to investigate if any criminal misconduct occurred."
articles.title: Bahamas Police Are Investigating Potential 'Criminal Misconduct' by FTX

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: Crypto.com’s $400 million mishap leaves its token down 50% and raises doubts over the exchange’s transparency following FTX’s collapse.
articles.title: Crypto.com Accidentally Sent $400M in Ethereum to Wrong Address, CEO Calls Concerns ‘FUD’

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: If you're not sure what differentiates a "shitcoin" from an altcoin, don't worry: some of the industry's biggest names at LaBitConf aren't either.
articles.title: What Makes a Shitcoin 'Shit'? Major Figures in Crypto Disagree

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The crypto industry bore witness to one of the most sudden and devastating contractions of wealth in financial history.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: FTX Goes Broke, Bitcoin Falls to Two-Year Low

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Several wallets belonging to FTX were rapidly drained before midnight. An FTX Telegram admin called it a hack and warned users not to visit the site.
articles.title: Hundreds of Millions of Dollars Drained From FTX Overnight in 'Unauthorized' Transfers

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: When SBF approached Musk about investing in his Twitter bid, Musk asked his banker Michael Grimes, "Does Sam actually have $3B liquid?"
articles.title: Elon Musk: Sam Bankman-Fried 'Set Off My BS Detector' When He Approached About Twitter Investment

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo,Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: FTX's ignominious collapse was inevitable, Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said at LaBitConf Friday.
articles.title: 'Like a 1930s Dictator': Vitalik Buterin Lays Into Sam Bankman-Fried and FTX

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Amid questions over holdings, Crypto.com shares its data—and a major meme token makes up a big chunk of its reserves.
articles.title: Crypto.com Holds 20% of Its Reserves in Meme Token SHIB

articles.author: Daniel Roberts,Andrew Hayward
articles.description: FTX signed sports deals worth $375 million—and that's just the deals with publicly reported price tags. Now it has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy.
articles.title: FTX Spent Hundreds of Millions of Dollars on Sports Marketing on Road to Bankruptcy

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
